text: This is a list of Albanian screenwriters.Arkivi Qendror Shtetëror i FilmitQendra Kombëtare e Kinematografisë ==Screenwriters== * Fatmir Gjata (1922-1989) * Llazar Siliqi (1924-2001) * Vath Koreshi (1936-2006) * Anastas Kondo (1937-2006) * Nexhati Tafa (1952) * Elvira Dones (1960) * Nijazi Ramadani (1964) ==References== Category:Albanian screenwriters
title: List of Albanian screenwriters
